extendedInfo.description: Deaths from heroin overdose are preventable â published by HIT, this app is designed to show users that overdose can be avoided if they know what puts them at risk, the warning signs of overdose and what to do in an emergency.HIT was established in 1985 to reduce drug-related harm and set up one of the worldâs first HIV prevention projects for people who use drugs. It is one of the leading agencies in the world dealing with education, information and training about legal and illegal drugs.
